definition: to jump/to hop/to skip over/to bounce/to palpitate
to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound
lit. even jumping into the Yellow River can't get you clean/fig. to become inexorably mixed up/mired in controversy/in deep trouble
pinyin: tiao4 jin4 Huang2 He2 xi3 bu4 qing1

sentences.english: The big boys jumped into the river but little Ned hung back.
sentences.chinese: 大些的男孩子都跳進河裏了，但小內德畏縮不前。

sentences.english: B:I took off my shirt and my watch and jumped into the water.
sentences.chinese: 我脫掉上衣，解下手錶，跳進水裏。

sentences.english: With that I jumped onto the brightly-lit bus which started moving on, leaving the old man behind.
sentences.chinese: 再跳進通明的汽車裏，驀地離開他了。

sentences.english: The soldier turned his horse quickly and plunged into the river.
sentences.chinese: 士兵迅速掉轉馬頭，跳進河裏。

sentences.english: If you can't see the bottom, jump in, don't dive.
sentences.chinese: 如果水深不見底，跳進去時腳先落水，不要俯衝下水。

sentences.english: He made a dive from the bridge to save the drowning child.
sentences.chinese: 他從橋上跳進水裏去搶救落水兒童。

sentences.english: Jump into it and found it not easy.
sentences.chinese: 跳進去才發現這裏面也不簡單。

sentences.english: But sometimes you just have to take the plunge.
sentences.chinese: 你是說，讓我不管三七二十一，跳進海里就好了？

sentences.english: He saw and heard the rumbling of the waves of that Ocean, but did not dive into It.
sentences.chinese: 他看到和聽到了海浪的隆隆聲，但沒有跳進去。

sentences.english: Kobe, you are a big rubbish, please get into the rubbish bin.
sentences.chinese: 秦中原，你是一個大垃圾，請趕快跳進垃圾桶裏。

sentences.english: The people that are jumping in now will lose big.
sentences.chinese: 現在跳進去的人將損失慘重。

sentences.english: He took a quick look and without another word jumped into the icy water.
sentences.chinese: 他匆忙看了一眼，二話沒說，就跳進冰冷刺骨的水裏。

sentences.english: I am wearing a dress made of rainbow, dipping myself into the blue brook of time.
sentences.chinese: 我披一件彩霞，跳進了時間深處流淌藍色溪流中。

sentences.english: Splash! A big-eyed, bulging bullfrog plops into a pond.
sentences.chinese: “撲通”，一隻眼睛又大又突的牛蛙跳進池塘裏。

sentences.english: The order to abandon the ship was given and hundreds of people plunged into the icy water.
sentences.chinese: 棄船的命令發出了，數百人跳進了冰冷刺骨的海水裏。

sentences.english: Towards evening， the boat struck a rock and the girl jumped into the sea.
sentences.chinese: 天將黑時，小船撞在了一塊礁石上，姑娘跳進了海里。
